attributes.title: Powerful Q&A Session Paramashivoham L2 (27 Mar 2020)
attributes.description:
Peek into the Q&A session from Paramashivoham Level 2 - where thousands of people across the world attended this ultimate spiritual happening on Earth which is pushing humanity to next level of consciousness, to the consciousness of Paramashiva, the Ultimate Superconsciousness as per Hinduism. The Avatar - HDH Nithyananda Paramashivam, who has realized the state of superconsciousness is transmitting His experience of Paramashivoham via initiation. In this Q&A session, participants have the amazing opportunity ask questions and receive answers the answers from Paramashiva Himself. Listen to the Cosmos itself giving the answers in a language that humanity understands and that not just the questioner. If you deeply tune in to this space where Paramashiva HIMSELF is answering humanity, you will find the intelligence, energy your questions need to be answered too. Listen deeply... Tune in to Paramashiva within you. Most importantly, don't forget to sign up for the next Paramashivoham Level 2 here

REGISTER HERE - http://paramashivoham.org/level2
